title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of astronauts explores a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When the menace known as the Joker emerges, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his partners and his involvement in organized crime.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.

title: Se7en
plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Green Mile
plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, who has a mysterious gift.

title: The Lion King
plot: A lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: The Prestige
plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have.

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General seeks vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Whiplash
plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing.

title: The Departed
plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

title: Parasite
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly-formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Joker
plot: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society, leading to his descent into madness.

title: The Social Network
plot: The story of Facebook's founding and the legal battles that followed as a result.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler and seeks her homeland.
